Table of Contents

Name

unsio - Unified Nbody Snapshot I/O routines

Synopsis

Description

unsio will be described later, in essence it is an I/O layer that allows you to read a variety of Nbody snapshot formats. Currently implemented are nemo and gadget. See uns_2dplot(1NEMO) for an example.

See Also

uns_2dplot(1NEMO)

https://projets.lam.fr/projects/unsio https://projets.lam.fr/projects/uns_projects

Author

Jean-Charles Lambert

Files


~/usr/jcl/unsio     library code
~/usr/jcl/uns_project   example code

Update History


may-2010    prototype installed     JCL
